info.title: Infoblox THREATPROTECTION API
info.description: OpenAPI specification for Infoblox NIOS WAPI THREATPROTECTION objects

get.description: Returns a list of threatprotection:grid:rule objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The rule category the custom rule assigned to.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The human readable comment for the custom rule.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the custom rule.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the rule custom rule concatenated with its rule config parameters.

parameters.name: ruleset
parameters.description: The version of the ruleset the custom rule assigned to.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The Rule ID.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: The threat protection rule template used to create this rule.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the custom rule.

get.description: Returns a specific threatprotection:grid:rule object by reference

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Reference of the threatprotection:grid:rule object

put.description: Updates a specific threatprotection:grid:rule object by reference

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Reference of the threatprotection:grid:rule object

delete.description: Deletes a specific threatprotection:grid:rule object by reference

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Reference of the threatprotection:grid:rule object

get.description: Returns a list of threatprotection:profile objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The comment for the Threat Protection profile.

parameters.name: current_ruleset
parameters.description: The current Threat Protection profile ruleset.

parameters.name: disable_multiple_dns_tcp_request
parameters.description: Determines if multiple BIND responses via TCP connection are disabled.

parameters.name: events_per_second_per_rule
parameters.description: The number of events logged per second per rule.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Threat Protection profile.

parameters.description: Reference of the threatprotection:profile object

parameters.description: Determines the way the ruleset was added.

parameters.description: The ruleset version.

get.description: Returns a list of threatprotection:ruletemplate objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The rule category this template assigned to.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the rule template.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the rule template.

parameters.name: ruleset
parameters.description: The version of the ruleset the template assigned to.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The Rule ID.

get.description: Returns a list of threatprotection:statistics objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: The Grid member name to get threat protection statistics. If nothing is specified then event statistics is returned for the Grid.

get.description: Returns a specific threatprotection:statistics object by reference

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Reference of the threatprotection:statistics object

ReturnFields.name: _return_fields
ReturnFields.description: Enter the field names followed by comma

ReturnFieldsPlus.name: _return_fields+
ReturnFieldsPlus.description: Enter the field names followed by comma, this returns the required fields along with the default fields

MaxResults.name: _max_results
MaxResults.description: Enter the number of results to be fetched

ReturnAsObject.name: _return_as_object
ReturnAsObject.description: Select 1 if result is required as an object

PageId.name: _page_id
PageId.description: Page id for retrieving next page of results

Schema.name: _schema
Schema.description: Return schema for this object type

Inheritance.name: _inheritance
Inheritance.description: If this option is set to True, fields which support inheritance, will display data properly.

value.description: The value of the extensible attribute.

ExtAttrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object.

allowed_actions.description: The list of allowed actions of the custom rule.

category.description: The rule category the custom rule assigned to.

comment.description: The human readable comment for the custom rule.

description.description: The description of the custom rule.

disabled.description: Determines if the custom rule is disabled.

is_factory_reset_enabled.description: Determines if factory reset is enabled for the custom rule.

name.description: The name of the rule custom rule concatenated with its rule config parameters.

ruleset.description: The version of the ruleset the custom rule assigned to.

template.description: The threat protection rule template used to create this rule.

type.description: The type of the custom rule.

read_only.description: Determines if parameter value is editable at member level.
